p: Discover our journey, values, and the people who drive our vision forward.
story: Founded as the result of merging Jeffrey G. Draesel MD PA's internal medicine practice and Jeffrey G. Draesel Jr. DC's chiropractic expertise, Innovative Medical Wellness has been serving the Miami community since 1982. Our mission is to provide personalized, high-quality healthcare that integrates holistic and regenerative medicine. Under the medical direction of Dr. Gregory Shtender MD, we combine over 40 years of expertise to help you unlock your body's natural potential for healing.
